meta.name: Generate Event Badges with QR Codes, HTMLCSStoImage, Gmail & Google Sheets

parameters.content:
## SETUP CREDENTIALS FIRST

**üîê HTMLCSStoImage API**
‚Ä¢ Sign up: https://htmlcsstoimg.com
‚Ä¢ Get API credentials from dashboard
‚Ä¢ Add to n8n: Basic Auth credential

**üìß Gmail OAuth2**
‚Ä¢ Select: "Gmail OAuth2 API"
‚Ä¢ Connect your Gmail account
‚Ä¢ Grant send permissions

**üìä Google Sheets API**  
‚Ä¢ Select: "Google Sheets OAuth2"
‚Ä¢ Authenticate with Google
‚Ä¢ Grant read/write access

**Test each credential before running the workflow**


**üí° Pro Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Use a dedicated Gmail for automation
‚Ä¢ Create a new Sheet for each event
‚Ä¢ Monitor API rate limits

## ERROR HANDLING

Triggered when badge generation fails

Sends admin alert with:
- Full attendee details
- Attendee ID
- Timestamp
- Possible failure causes
- Action items

To: admin@example.com

Next steps:
- Check API status
- Review logs
- Retry manually

## STEP 9: SEND BADGE EMAIL

Sends via Gmail with:
- Personalized HTML email
- Badge download link
- Event instructions
- Check-in details
- Contact information

To: Attendee email
Attachment: Badge PNG from URL

Continue on fail: ON

## STEP 8: EXTRACT BADGE URL

Extracts image URL from API response

Returns clean data:
- binary file named badge

Used for: Logging & email

## STEP 6: CONDITIONAL LOGIC

CONDITIONAL CHECK

Verifies badge generation success

Condition: {{ $json.image_url }} is not empty

TRUE (Green):
‚Üí Badge generated successfully
‚Üí Continue to email delivery

FALSE (Red):
‚Üí Generation failed
‚Üí Send error alert to admin

## STEP 5: BUILD HTML BADGE

Uses HTMLCSStoImage AP

Sends:
- Full HTML code
- Viewport: 400x680px

Returns: Image URL

Auth: Basic Auth with API credentials

Continue on fail: ON

## STEP 4: PREPARE QR URL

Converts binary QR to accessible URL

Creates URL:
https://api.qrserver.com/...?data=ATD-XXX

Used for: Embedding in HTML badge template

## STEP 3: QR CODE GENERATION

Creates QR code via qrserver.com API

Parameters:
- Size: 300x300px
- Data: Attendee ID
- Format: PNG image

Output: Binary QR code file

Continue on fail: ON

## STEP 2: DATA VALIDATION

Operations:
‚úì Validates email format
‚úì Checks name exists
‚úì Generates unique attendee ID
‚úì Capitalizes name properly
‚úì Extracts initials (2 letters)
‚úì Normalizes email to lowercase
‚úì Sets default event/role if missing
‚úì Adds timestamp

Throws error if:
- Email invalid
- Name missing

## STEP 1: WEBHOOK TRIGGER

**Test with cURL:**
```bash
curl -X POST https://your-n8n.com/webhook/admissio
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{
    "name": "Jane Smith",
    "email": "your-email@gmail.com",
    "event": "TechCon 2025",
    "role": "VIP Speaker"
}'
```

## WORKFLOW OVERVIEW

**Purpose:** Automated event badge generation system

**Processing Time:** 5-8 seconds end-to-end

**Workflow Steps:**
1. Receive registration data via webhook (POST)
2. Validate email and format inputs
3. Generate unique QR code with attendee ID
4. Create custom HTML badge design
5. Convert HTML to downloadable PNG
6. Log all data to Google Sheets
7. Send badge via email with instructions

**Success Path:**
‚úÖ Valid data ‚Üí Badge generated ‚Üí Email sent

**Error Path:**
‚ùå Invalid data ‚Üí Workflow stopped ‚Üí Error logged

**Perfect For:**
‚Ä¢ Universities & colleges
‚Ä¢ Corporate events
‚Ä¢ Conferences & seminars
‚Ä¢ Training programs

parameters.message:
=

‚ö†Ô∏è Badge Generation Failed

A badge generation request has failed.

Attendee Details:

Name: {{ $('Validate & Sanitize').item.json.name }}
Email: {{ $('Validate & Sanitize').item.json.email }}
Event: {{ $('Validate & Sanitize').item.json.event }}
Role: {{ $('Validate & Sanitize').item.json.role }}
Attendee ID: {{ $('Validate & Sanitize').item.json.attendeeId }}
Timestamp: {{ $('Validate & Sanitize').item.json.timestamp }}

Possible Causes:

  • HTMLCSStoImage API is down or rate limited
  • API credentials expired or invalid
  • Network connectivity issues
  • Invalid HTML in badge template

Action Required:

  1. Check n8n workflow execution logs
  2. Verify HTMLCSStoImage API status
  3. Manually regenerate badge for this attendee
  4. Contact attendee if urgent

Workflow Name: Event Badge Generator

n8n Instance: n8n.mediajade.com
parameters.subject: ‚ö†Ô∏è Badge Generation Failed

Hello {{ $json.Name }},

Great news! Your personalized event badge for {{ $json.Event }} has been generated successfully.

üìã Your Badge Details

Name: {{ $json.Name }}
Role: {{ $json.Role }}
Attendee ID: {{ $json['Attendee ID'] }}
Event: {{ $json.Event }}
üì• Download Your Badge

üìå Important Instructions:

  • Download your badge using the button above
  • Print it in color on standard paper OR save it on your phone
  • Present your badge at the event entrance for check-in
  • The QR code on your badge will be scanned for quick entry

Event Details:

  • üìÖ Date: October 25-27, 2025
  • üìç Venue: Convention Center
  • üïê Check-in: Opens 8:00 AM daily

If you have any questions or need assistance, please reply to this email or contact our support team.

We look forward to seeing you at the event! üéä

Best regards,
TechCon 2025 Team

parameters.content:
## STEP 9: LOG TO GOOGLE SHEETS

Appends row to tracking sheet:
- Name
- Email
- Event
- Role
- Attendee ID
- Badge URL
- Timestamp

Sheet: Event Badge Tracker
Continue on fail: ON
